fields.name: Executioner (Passive):
fields.value: You will attack whoever the King orders you to attack. This ability cannot be roleblocked.

fields.name: Fearsome Reputation (Passive, Locked):
fields.value: Once you kill 4 players, your defense power will double, and any investigations targeting you will be wrong.

fields.name: Treason (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Convert yourself to any Neutral role.

fields.name: No More (Passive):
fields.value: If you kill 3 Town players total, your Executioner ability becomes Locked and you die the following night.

fields.name: Royal Hierarchy (Passive):
fields.value: This role is unique. You must spawn with The King.
